DOC.brief_summary: The Xolair Pregnancy Registry is an observational study established by Genentech to obtain data on pregnancy outcomes in women who are exposed to Xolair. Women exposed to at least one dose of Xolair within 8 weeks prior to conception or at any time during their pregnancy will be followed to completion of their pregnancies. The evaluation of infants will be conducted at birth and at 6-month intervals until infants are 12 months old.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of the Use and Safety of Xolair During Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Eligibility for enrollment is based on Xolair exposure in women, whether inadvertent or deliberate, in relation to pregnancy. Women who have been exposed to at least one dose of Xolair within 8 weeks prior to conception or during pregnancy may be included in this registry.
